languages.text: Не приспособленный к битве транспорт должен быть легкой целью, но мерцающий колдовской щит окружает корабль и поглощает взрывы. Мостик взрывается воплями праведного гнева.
A transport unfitted for battle should be an easy target, but an impossible shimmering field surrounds the ship and absorbs the explosions. The bridge erupts with cries of righteous anger.
languages.original_text: Не приспособленный к битве транспорт должен быть легкой целью, но мерцающий колдовской щит окружает корабль и поглощает взрывы. Мостик взрывается воплями праведного гнева.

traits.locale_text: A transport ship unfitted for battle should be an easy target, but a shimmering sorcerous shield surrounds the ship and absorbs the explosions. The bridge erupts with cries of righteous anger.
A transport ship unfitted for battle should be an easy target, but a shimmering sorcerous shield surrounds the ship and absorbs the explosions. The bridge erupts with cries of righteous anger.
A transport ship unfitted for battle should be an easy target, but a shimmering sorcerous shield surrounds the ship and absorbs the explosions. The bridge erupts with cries of righteous anger.
A transport ship unfitted for battle should be an easy target, but a shimmering sorcerous shield surrounds the ship and absorbs the explosions. The bridge erupts with cries of righteous anger.
A transport unfitted for battle should be an easy target, but an impossible shimmering field surrounds the ship and absorbs the explosions. The bridge erupts with cries of righteous anger.
A transport unfitted for battle should be an easy target, but an impossible shimmering field surrounds the ship and absorbs the explosions. The bridge erupts with cries of righteous anger.

languages.text: Ein nicht kampftauglicher Transporter sollte eigentlich ein leichtes Ziel sein, aber das Schiff ist von einem schimmernden Feld umgeben, das die Explosionen absorbiert. Auf der Brücke werden wütende Schreie laut.
languages.original_text: A transport unfitted for battle should be an easy target, but an impossible shimmering field surrounds the ship and absorbs the explosions. The bridge erupts with cries of righteous anger.

traits.locale_text: Ein nicht kampftauglicher Transporter sollte eigentlich ein leichtes Ziel sein, aber das Schiff ist von einem schimmernden Feld umgeben, das die Explosionen absorbiert. Auf der Brücke werden wütende Schreie laut.

languages.text: Un transporteur inadapté au combat devrait constituer une cible facile, mais un champ magnétique miroitant tel que vous n'en aviez encore jamais vu protège sa coque et absorbe les explosions. La passerelle résonne au diapason des cris de fureur indignée.
languages.original_text: A transport unfitted for battle should be an easy target, but an impossible shimmering field surrounds the ship and absorbs the explosions. The bridge erupts with cries of righteous anger.

traits.locale_text: Un transporteur inadapté au combat devrait constituer une cible facile, mais un champ magnétique miroitant tel que vous n'en aviez encore jamais vu protège sa coque et absorbe les explosions. La passerelle résonne au diapason des cris de fureur indignée.

languages.text: Un transporte no equipado para la batalla debería ser blanco fácil, pero un campo reluciente e imposible rodea la nave y absorbe las explosiones. El puente estalla con gritos de furia justiciera.
languages.original_text: A transport unfitted for battle should be an easy target, but an impossible shimmering field surrounds the ship and absorbs the explosions. The bridge erupts with cries of righteous anger.

traits.locale_text: Un transporte no equipado para la batalla debería ser blanco fácil, pero un campo reluciente e imposible rodea la nave y absorbe las explosiones. El puente estalla con gritos de furia justiciera.

languages.text: 戦闘に適さない輸送船は容易い目標となりうるが、信じられないほどに煌めくフィールドが船を取り囲み、爆発を吸収する。ブリッジは怒号に包まれた。
languages.original_text: A transport unfitted for battle should be an easy target, but an impossible shimmering field surrounds the ship and absorbs the explosions. The bridge erupts with cries of righteous anger.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘に適さない輸送船は容易い目標となりうるが、信じられないほどに煌めくフィールドが船を取り囲み、爆発を吸収する。ブリッジは怒号に包まれた。

languages.text: 这艘不适合战斗的运输船本该是个很容易消灭的目标，但船身周围包裹着诡异的光幕，将所有爆炸吸收其中。舰桥上发出了义愤填膺的怒吼。
languages.original_text: A transport unfitted for battle should be an easy target, but an impossible shimmering field surrounds the ship and absorbs the explosions. The bridge erupts with cries of righteous anger.

traits.locale_text: 这艘不适合战斗的运输船本该是个很容易消灭的目标，但船身周围包裹着诡异的光幕，将所有爆炸吸收其中。舰桥上发出了义愤填膺的怒吼。

languages.text: Çatışmaya müsait olmayan bir nakliye gemisi, kolay bir hedef olsa da geminin etrafını olağan dışı parlaklıkta bir alan sararak patlamaları soğuruyor. Köprüde erdemli öfke feryatları kopuyor.
languages.original_text: A transport unfitted for battle should be an easy target, but an impossible shimmering field surrounds the ship and absorbs the explosions. The bridge erupts with cries of righteous anger.
